text: Eligius may refer to: * Saint Eligius (c. 588–659), Catholic patron saint of goldsmiths and other metalworkers * Eligius Franz Joseph von Münch- Bellinghausen (1806–1871), known als Friedrich Halm, Austrian dramatist, poet and short-story writer * Eligius Fromentin (c. 1767–1822), American politician Category:Masculine given names
title: Eligius
